section.name: James 1.2 - Architecture
section.p: JAMES is a multi-protocol message processing and storage engine. JAMES currently consists of:

ul.li: two mail prototcol servers (SMTP and POP3),
a mail processing engine that supports the Mailet API
file-system message storage and a message storage interface to RDBMS's
file-system user record storage and an experimental interface to LDAP directories
beta support for TLS (SSL) for POP3 and remote administration

section.p: JAMES is built on top of Avalon, the Java Apache Server Framework. Versions 1.1 and 1.2 of James use a slightly older version of Avalon, specifically the avalon-james-1-1b1 branch. We intend to migrate to the new Avalon in the near future.
